snippet.title: Bowling Buddies by Playfish
snippet.description: Play here: http://apps.facebook.com/bowlingbuddies - Go bowling with your friends! Enjoy a game of Bowling with your friends and show of your style through your own customisable 3D character. Once you have mastered the single player mode you can you can go head to head with one of your friends in the challenge mode and see who comes out on top! Getting into the game is easy with the intuitive natural mouse controls, using your mouse you literally pick up the ball and throw it!
